attributes.action: Sack the Director of Children Haringey Council - Sharon Shoesmith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a brazen display of arrogance on the TV - following the murder of a toddler on their " at risk " register- She must take responsibility for "not caring in the right way for the boy and being a contributory factor in his death .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
